channel.title: Air on Xeneta Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Air on Xeneta Docs

item.title: Benchmarking Methodology
item.description: What kind of cargo do we benchmark? At this moment, Xeneta only benchmarks general cargo.

item.title: Service Levels
item.description: Introduction Xeneta categorizes your air freight rates based on three different service levels: “Upper Tier”, “Mid Tier”, and “Lower Tier”. This allows a direct comparison to other market rates that are most similar to yours. The reason for standardizing and categorizing these rates is because many freight forwarders use different names for their service levels. Re-categorizing and renaming these service levels allows us to more easily standardize and compare the rates directly with others in the market.
